meta.title: Amiran Bestaev — Frontend Developer (Vue/Nuxt)
meta.description: Frontend developer with 5+ years of experience. Vue/Nuxt/TypeScript, complex UIs, GSAP animations, e2e testing.

hero.name: Amiran Bestaev
hero.subtitle: I build fast, expressive interfaces for products with maps, catalogs, and complex business logic.
hero.status: Open to opportunities: remote, hybrid, on-site

work.title: Selected Work
work.subtitle: Projects in e-commerce, delivery, and real estate with rich UI and complex logic.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: Focused on Vue/Nuxt, TypeScript, performance, and production stability.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Frontend developer with 5+ years of commercial experience. Specializing in Vue.js and Nuxt.js (Vue 2/3, Nuxt 2/3) with TypeScript. I worked on legacy codebases, SPA/SSR architecture, and introduced testing. I value clean code, clear architecture, and product thinking.

projects.name: FoodMap Delivery
projects.description: Map search and filters, fast selection of restaurants and couriers, interactive states for users.

projects.name: Vkusno i Bystro
projects.description: Animated UI components, improved user flow, and stable production performance.

projects.name: Tsvet Divanov
projects.description: Catalog, filters, and product cards optimized for speed and easy selection.

projects.name: Fordewind
projects.description: UI build with a focus on visual storytelling, responsive layout, and readability.

projects.name: U2
projects.description: Property showcase, filters, and interactive selection scenarios.

projects.name: Massandra Park
projects.description: Property catalog with strong visuals and clear navigation.

projects.name: Maks
projects.description: Promo and property showcase with an emphasis on premium UI.

bullets: Designed a multi-level filter (“queue → building → section”) and extracted logic into a reusable composable.
Built a universal calculator (mortgage/installments) with strong typing and extensible architecture.
Delivered advanced GSAP animations for a map interface with custom pins.
Migrated key modules from Vue 2 to Vue 3 + TypeScript and reduced client bundle size.
Introduced e2e testing (Cypress) and code review practices.
Integrated maps and optimized pages with lazy loading via Intersection Observer.

footer.title: Let's build a strong interface
footer.subtitle: Open to opportunities. I can quickly join a team and deliver to release.
